2009 Exhibition - Daily Raffle Winners

Saturday

Austrains HO scale Pacific National ‘DL’ class loco
Mr. David Leek

Sunday

‘Thomas the Tank Engine’ starter set
Mr. Sam Gilbert, Rosanna

Monday

Auscision HO scale Australian National ‘EL’ class loco
Mr. John Pettit, GLen Waverley

WMRC is indebted to our most generous sponsors, Austrains, Branchline of Croydon and Auscision for the donation of these prizes.
